subject: Shipping problem
description_text:
Hi,

I have recently ordered a product from your page in the form of a steering
wheel and decided that to go with the Express 3-7 days shipping as I was in
a rush to get it. However, unfortunately more then 7 days have passed since
I placed my order and my order has not even gotten in my country of
delivery. Because of this I would like to ask for compensation due to the
fact that the mentioned delivery time frame was not meet.

I have waited not only 7 days as of today 30th of September in my time zone
of the Uk. But also allocated enough time in the form of 7 BUSINESS days
(Monday to Friday) but also with the 1-2 days manufacturing  delay.

Hope to hear from you soon and be able to come up with a suitable agreement
for the inconvenience I have experienced.

Thanks,
Alex Ancuta

conversations.body_text:
Sorry for the confusion but I forgot to add the order number which is : *Order
#SSN2689*
Hello, I see that your package has indeed been delayed. We will provide appropriate compensation based on the delivery time once the package arrives. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045928902193

Hi, I received my package today. I was wondering what will be the
compensation based on the delivery delay.

And also I will also like to ask for some directions on the use of the
product as I am unable to connect it to my computer. When I plugged it in
to my computer and others the product does not appear on the
Simsonn manager app and some of the buttons do not work.

Thanks,
Alex Ancuta

Hi Flow,      We apologize for the delayed responseâ€”we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. This steering wheel does not support Simsonn Manager adjustments; it's plug-and-play. The buttons require in-game configuration. If you continue to encounter issues, please provide us with a video.
